response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 37
response.overview: The 37th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror films that have been submitted!! This time as well, "Minna no Hanabi, Hanabi no Hanabi" is a video taken when the contributor went to a fireworks display with his lover. The first half contains a video of beautiful fireworks shooting into the night sky, but the second half of the video shows the two of them setting off fireworks together. However, if you look closely at the image, you will see an eerie figure that is about to attack your lover. A terrible secret was hidden there.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 37
